name: Id Insinuation III
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text:
This spell functions as id insinuation I, except as noted above.

In addition, on the first 2 rounds of the effect, the targets of this spell must roll twice to determine the result of their confused conditions. You select which roll is used. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同本我暗示 I（ID Insinuation I）一般，差异如上所述。此外，在该效果的前两轮，该法术的目标必须投掷两次来判断困惑状态（confused condition）的结果。由你选择使用哪个检定结果。该法术可以被降阶施法。
